responses.rationale: The segment factually reports case locations without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment factually reports a confirmed case and scale without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports the number of states with confirmed cases factually without high-potency language.
The segment describes the likely cause of spread factually without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports new cases and the number of birds killed factually without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports the total number of birds killed nationally factually without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment reports the number of birds killed in Iowa factually without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
The segment provides factual background data on Iowa's egg production and chicken inventory.
The segment provides factual background data on Iowa's annual turkey production.
